name: The Weeknd
description: Known for his smooth vocals and dark pop sound that blends R&B and synthwave.

name: Lana Del Rey
description: Known for cinematic, nostalgic music that feels timeless and melancholic.

name: Taylor Swift
description: Master storyteller who blends pop and folk influences into emotional narratives.

name: SZA
description: Critically acclaimed for her dreamy, soulful style and lyrical vulnerability.
